headline: The Stock Market Has a Profit Margin Problem
summary: Companies don’t appear to be raising prices despite tariffs, and that’s weighing on profit margins.  In April, President Donald Trump announced a 10% tax on goods from most countries, plus additional country-specific levies that are now on pause.  The assumption before Trump’s initial tariff announcements was that most companies would offset higher costs with price increases.
